member.summary: Manually runs the ApplicantId claims migration. This endpoint allows admins to trigger the migration on demand.

member.name: M:ERecruitment.Web.Controllers.AdminController.VerifyClaimsMigration
member.summary: Verifies that all applicants have correct ApplicantId claims. Useful for debugging after migration.

member.name: M:ERecruitment.Web.Controllers.AdminController.FixOrphanedApplicants
member.summary: Fixes orphaned applicants by creating Identity users for them. Orphaned applicants are those that exist in the domain database but have no Identity user.

member.summary: Shows a list of orphaned applicants (those without Identity users).

member.summary: Handles errors that occur during request processing. Shows appropriate error view based on status code.

member.name: T:ERecruitment.Web.Data.ClaimsMigration
member.summary: Migrates existing Identity users to include ApplicantId claims. This is a one-time migration needed when switching from session-based to claims-based authentication.

member.name: M:ERecruitment.Web.Data.ClaimsMigration.MigrateApplicantClaimsAsync(System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Migrates all existing applicants to have ApplicantId claims in their Identity user accounts. Safe to run multiple times - will skip users that already have the claim.

member.name: M:ERecruitment.Web.Data.ClaimsMigration.MigrateApplicantClaimAsync(ERecruitment.Web.Models.Applicant,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Migrates a single applicant's claim.

member.summary: Standalone migration runner for manual execution. Can be called from command line or as a separate process.

member.name: M:ERecruitment.Web.Data.MigrationRunner.RunClaimsMigrationAsync(System.IServiceProvider)
member.summary: Runs the ApplicantId claims migration. This can be called manually if you want to skip automatic migration on startup.

member.name: M:ERecruitment.Web.Data.MigrationRunner.VerifyClaimsMigrationAsync(System.IServiceProvider)
member.summary: Verifies that all applicants have corresponding ApplicantId claims. Useful for debugging or verification after migration.

member.name: M:ERecruitment.Web.Data.MigrationRunner.RemoveAllApplicantClaimsAsync(System.IServiceProvider)
member.summary: Removes all ApplicantId claims (for testing/rollback purposes only). WARNING: This will break authentication for applicants!

member.name: T:ERecruitment.Web.Services.AuditOptions
member.summary: Configuration options for audit trail retention.

member.name: P:ERecruitment.Web.Services.AuditOptions.MaxEntriesPerApplication
member.summary: Maximum number of audit entries retained per job application. Use 0 or a negative value to disable count-based pruning.

member.name: P:ERecruitment.Web.Services.AuditOptions.RetentionDays
member.summary: Number of days to retain audit entries. Entries older than this threshold are pruned. Use 0 or a negative value to disable time-based pruning.

member.name: T:ERecruitment.Web.Services.EfRecruitmentRepository
member.summary: Entity Framework Core implementation of the recruitment repository. 100% async, optimized queries, zero N+1 patterns.

member.name: M:ERecruitment.Web.Services.EfRecruitmentRepository.BulkUpdateApplicationStatusAsync(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{System.Guid},ERecruitment.Web.Models.ApplicationStatus,System.String,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: OPTIMIZED: Bulk update for rejection workflow. Eliminates N+1 query pattern: 3,000+ queries â†’ 2 queries. Uses single transaction for atomicity.

member.name: M:ERecruitment.Web.Services.EfRecruitmentRepository.GetDashboardStatisticsAsync(System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: OPTIMIZED: Dashboard statistics using database aggregation. Memory usage: O(1) - does NOT load all applicants. Query count: 3 queries (stats + equity breakdown + jobs).

member.name: M:ERecruitment.Web.Services.EfRecruitmentRepository.GetApplicantFullProfileAsync(System.Guid,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Gets full applicant profile with all related data for admin viewing. Includes profile, equity declaration, applications with audit trails, and all owned entities.

member.name: T:ERecruitment.Web.Services.ICurrentApplicant
member.summary: Abstracts access to the currently authenticated applicant from the session. Decouples services from HttpContext and session management.

member.name: M:ERecruitment.Web.Services.ICurrentApplicant.GetAsync(System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Gets the currently authenticated applicant from session. Returns null if no applicant is logged in.

member.name: M:ERecruitment.Web.Services.ICurrentApplicant.SetAsync(System.Guid,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Sets the current applicant in session after successful login/registration.

member.name: M:ERecruitment.Web.Services.ICurrentApplicant.Clear
member.summary: Clears the current applicant from session (logout).

member.name: M:ERecruitment.Web.Services.ICurrentApplicant.GetApplicantId
member.summary: Gets the applicant ID from session without loading the full entity. Returns null if no applicant is logged in.

member.name: T:ERecruitment.Web.Services.InMemoryRecruitmentRepository
member.summary: In-memory implementation of IRecruitmentRepository for testing and development. NOT suitable for production use - data is lost on restart.

member.name: T:ERecruitment.Web.Services.IRecruitmentRepository
member.summary: Repository interface for recruitment system data access. All operations are asynchronous to prevent thread pool exhaustion.

member.name: M:ERecruitment.Web.Services.IRecruitmentRepository.BulkUpdateApplicationStatusAsync(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{System.Guid},ERecruitment.Web.Models.ApplicationStatus,System.String,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Optimized bulk update for rejection workflow. Single transaction, single database round trip.

member.name: M:ERecruitment.Web.Services.IRecruitmentRepository.GetDashboardStatisticsAsync(System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Gets dashboard statistics using optimized database aggregation. Does NOT load all applicants into memory.

member.name: M:ERecruitment.Web.Services.IRecruitmentRepository.GetApplicantFullProfileAsync(System.Guid,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Gets full applicant profile with all related data for admin viewing. Includes profile, equity declaration, applications, and all documents.

member.name: M:ERecruitment.Web.Validation.SafeStringAttribute.SafeCharactersRegex
member.remarks:
Pattern:
^[a-zA-Z0-9\\s\\-'.,&()/]+$
Explanation:
â—‹ Match if at the beginning of the string.
â—‹ Match a character in the set [&-),-9A-Za-z\s] greedily at least once.
â—‹ Match if at the end of the string or if before an ending newline.
